Hui
dialog switchable validator autocomplete

Dialog - ajax 载入内容

var Dialog = Hui.Dialog;
var example = new Dialog({
    trigger: '#example1',
    content: './ajax-page.html?ajax'
});
var example = new Dialog({
    trigger: '#example2',
    content: './ajax-page.html'
});

ajax-page 的内容如下：

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
  <style>
  body {color:red; height: 200px;}
  </style>
<head>
<body>
  <div>我是一个页面的内容</div>
  <div>我是一个页面的内容</div>
</body>
</html>
